statements: DELETE FROM bicycle_models WHERE id = 1 AND brand = 'Trek';
DELETE FROM bicycle_models WHERE wheel_size > 26 AND price < 1000;
DELETE FROM bicycle_models WHERE id = 1 AND brand = 'Trek';
DELETE FROM bicycle_prices WHERE model_id IN (SELECT id FROM bicycle_models WHERE brand = 'Giant' AND year < 2020);
DELETE FROM bike_sales WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM bike_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Specifications WHERE color = 'Red' AND weight = 10.5;
DELETE FROM Specifications WHERE model_id = 3 AND weight > 10;
